pdf:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
<#if subsidiary.logo@url?has_content></#if>
${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}
CREDIT MEMO
Date ${record.trandate?string('MMM-dd-yyyy')}
Invoice# ${subsidiary.id}-${record.tranid}
Account# ${record.accountnumber}
PO# ${record.otherrefnum}
Order Type ${record.custbody_so_ordertype}
<#if subsidiary.country='United States'>EIN# <#elseif subsidiary.country='Australia'> ABN <#elseif subsidiary.country='Ireland'>VAT No: IE <#elseif subsidiary.country='United Kingdom'>VAT No: GB <#else> VAT No: </#if> ${record.subsidiary.taxidnum}
<#if subsidiary.currency='AUD'>
GST No: ${subsidiary.state1taxnumber}
</#if>
Thank you for your business!
Billing Questions: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ar_phonenum} or ${subsidiary.email}
${subsidiary.custrecord_invoice_footer1}
${subsidiary.custrecord_invoice_footer2}
of
<body header="nlheader" header-height="20%" footer="nlfooter" padding="0.25in 0.25in 0.25in 0.25in" size="Letter" footer-height= <#if record.subsidiary.custrecord_invoice_footer1?has_content>"7%" <#else>"4%" </#if> >
${record.billaddress@label} <#if record.subsidiary.id="10">${record.shipaddress@label}</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.id="44">${record.shipaddress@label}</#if>
<#if record.billaddressee="">${record.entity.companyname}
${record.billaddress} <#else> ${record.billaddress} </#if> <#if record.entity.vatregnumber?has_content>
VAT: ${record.entity.vatregnumber}</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.id="10">${record.shipaddress}</#if><#if record.subsidiary.id="44">${record.shipaddress}</#if>
${record.custbody_so_enduser@label} Contact
${record.custbody_so_enduser.altname} ${record.custbody_invoice_contact.firstname} ${record.custbody_invoice_contact.middlename} ${record.custbody_invoice_contact.lastname}
<#if record.item?has_content>
<#list record.item as item><#if item_index==0>
${item.item@label} ${item.description@label} ${item.quantity@label} ERP
Version ${item.amount@label} <#if record.currency='CAD'>GST/HST <#else>Tax
Rate</#if> <#if record.currency='CAD'> PST </#if>
</#if>
${item.item} ${item.description}<#if item.custcol_term_start_date?has_content>
${item.custcol_term_start_date?string('MMM-dd-yyyy')}</#if> <#if item.custcol_term_end_date?has_content> to ${item.custcol_term_end_date?string('MMM-dd-yyyy')}</#if> <#if item.amount gte 0> ${(item.quantity)*(-1)} <#else> ${item.quantity}</#if> ${item.class} <#assign newamount = ((item.amount)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '£')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'R')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '¥')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '₹')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'د.إ')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'kr')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'CHF')>
</#if> ${newamount} ${item.taxrate1} <#if record.currency='CAD'> ${item.taxrate2} </#if> </#list> </#if>
Message: ${record.message}
${record.subtotal@label} <#assign newamount = ((record.subtotal)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '£')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'R')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '¥')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '₹')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'د.إ')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'kr')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'CHF')> </#if> ${newamount} ${record.currency}
<#if record.currency='USD'>Tax Total <#elseif record.currency='CAD'>GHT/HST Total <#elseif record.currency='AUD'>GST Total <#else>VAT Total</#if>
<#if record.tax2total?has_content> PST Total</#if> <#assign newamount = ((record.taxtotal)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '£')> <#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'R')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '¥')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '₹')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'د.إ')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'kr')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'CHF')> </#if> <#if record.tax2total?has_content> <#assign newamount2 = ((record.tax2total)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '£')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', 'R')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '¥')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '₹')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', 'د.إ')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', 'kr')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', 'CHF')> </#if> </#if> ${newamount} ${record.currency}
<#if record.tax2total?has_content>${newamount2} ${record.currency}</#if>
Total Credit <#assign newamount = ((record.total)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '£')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'R')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '¥')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '₹')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'د.إ')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'kr')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', 'CHF')> </#if> ${newamount} ${record.currency}
<#if record.subsidiary.currency!=record.currency && record.subsidiary.custrecord_tax_reporting_currency?has_content>
TOTAL TAX BREAKDOWN
Exchange Rate <#if subsidiary.custrecord_tax_reporting_currency='EUR'>${record.custbody_exchange_rate_to_euro?string('0.0000')} EUR <#else>${record.exchangerate?string('0.0000')} ${subsidiary.currency}</#if>
Tax Rate ${(record.taxtotal/record.subtotal*100)*(-1)} %
Total Tax <#assign newamount = ((record.taxtotal*record.custbody_exchange_rate_to_euro)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#else> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> </#if> <#assign newamount2 = ((record.taxtotal*record.exchangerate)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#else> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> </#if> <#if subsidiary.custrecord_tax_reporting_currency='EUR'>${newamount} EUR <#else>${newamount2} ${subsidiary.currency}</#if>
Total Net <#assign newamount = ((record.total*record.custbody_exchange_rate_to_euro)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> <#else> <#assign newamount = newamount?replace('$', '€')> </#if> <#assign newamount2 = ((record.total*record.exchangerate)*(-1))?string.currency> <#if record.currency == 'EUR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'GBP'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')>
<#elseif record.currency == 'ZAR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'JPY'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'INR'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'AED'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'DKK'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> <#elseif record.currency == 'CHF'> <#assign newamount2 = newamount2?replace('$', '€')> </#if> <#if subsidiary.custrecord_tax_reporting_currency='EUR'>${newamount} EUR <#else>${newamount2} ${subsidiary.currency}</#if>
</#if>
